jsonStreamers.name: Ace
jsonStreamers.bio: Ace (they/them) is a Black queer activist and a content creator. Ace aims to be a voice for various marginalized folx while, sometimes, playing games on twitch!

jsonStreamers.name: ShadowTtar
jsonStreamers.bio: Scottish pansexual content creator who takes the time to get to know everyone who visit his chat. Usually playing an FPS such as Destiny/Apex, trying out an RPG or trying to create a new masterpiece under the Art tag ranging from cosplay to an emote.

jsonStreamers.name: Ryoko
jsonStreamers.bio: Genderfluid variety streamer who is happy to be back for the third year in a row!

jsonStreamers.name: MintyMiamice
jsonStreamers.bio: I am a loud, passionate, and easily impressed owner of 5 darling cats! Bad at video games and proud of it, so you better believe I play games for a long time and finish almost none of them.

jsonStreamers.name: PassionsPlanet
jsonStreamers.bio:
Passion's Planet is a British trans Twitch streamer + DJ. On Twitch she's a Y2K variety streamer. Catch her playing games from the 2000's, with a feminine touch, every Tuesday, Thursday & Saturday.

It's Passion's Planet and you're just livin' in it.

jsonStreamers.name: TheLeonaUwU
jsonStreamers.bio: Genderfluid U.S. Army Veteran Gaymer who strives at building a positive and inclusive space filled with love and acceptance. Only thing not tolerated within my community is intolerance. All are free to be who they are as long as they are about love

jsonStreamers.name: VeritasUnae
jsonStreamers.bio: It's seasons all year round at Veri's, with platformers, puzzle games and plenty of fun! As an agender pansexual, they hope to provide a comfy space for diverse communities to chat and have a good time.

jsonStreamers.name: ReadyPlayerGabe
jsonStreamers.bio:
Hey I’m ReadyPlayerGabe

 Proud Member Of the LGBTQIA+ Love playing RPG’s Chill and Laid back.So Im Back For Another Year for The Summer Of Pride Lets Get This Party Started.

jsonStreamers.name: SincerelyUnique
jsonStreamers.bio: SincerelyUnique is a variety streamer who focuses on story-rich games like JRPG's, Visual Novels, or Adventure games. He believes in the community-building capability of games and enjoys including everyone in on the fun and discussion.

jsonStreamers.name: FistfulOfGlitterGaming
jsonStreamers.bio: Hi I'm Glitter and I am a Queer Latinx variety streamer on Twitch! I love to make people laugh and try to create a brave space for my viewers to share their experiences safely, but also have fun and feel accepted while doing so.

jsonStreamers.name: astralfaerie
jsonStreamers.bio: The name astralfaerie was created as a pseudonym for a drag persona, but now I use it as my online gaming name and persona. Most people call me astral for short. I identify as genderless, meaning I do not see myself as having or needing a gender.

jsonStreamers.name: SGAK
jsonStreamers.bio: I'm Stellan, a colorful genderqueer variety gaymer with a passion for cuteness ♡

jsonStreamers.name: Aphasia Speaks
jsonStreamers.bio: Hi! I'm Aphasia Speaks! I run the speakeasy on twitch. Im a genderqueer(he/she/they) Black drag artist and verity streamer. I love a good story game that makes me feel things. But i also love to jump in a lobby with friends and let the chaos happen!

jsonStreamers.name: Antipodean_Squid
jsonStreamers.bio: An Australian non-binary V-tuber that likes to play comfy games and get creative. I mostly play cozy games and indie titles and particularly like to play games with queer themes and representation. I also like to do crafts, writing, and TTRPGs!

jsonStreamers.name: Chelora
jsonStreamers.bio: Chelora is a trans drag queen from Canada, and member of Team Stream Queens.  She streams new, bold and old console on Twitch.  Chelora hopes to fill the world with smiles and laughter, even if it means using puns; the lowest form of comedy.

jsonStreamers.name: inkmo_
jsonStreamers.bio: I enjoy both digital art and physical mediums. I sculpt, smith, sew, bake, paint, draw and wildly bash things together until they make a thing. Welcome to a world where I am bringing the relentless imaginings of my mind to life.

jsonStreamers.name: urbanbohemian
jsonStreamers.bio: Brian AKA urbanbohemian is a Black Queer content creator, writer, and foodie with a “PhD in Brunch”. Playing visual novels, action RPGs, cozy games and the occasional looter shooter, he loves to have a good time and maintain a safe space on stream.

jsonStreamers.name: WirelessRiot
jsonStreamers.bio: I'm Mande, and I'm a demi-ace content creator here on Twitch. I focus on narrative, simulation, management and point and click adventure games! I also host a once a month cooking show focusing on Cooking with Chronic Pain.

jsonStreamers.name: the_juliancito
jsonStreamers.bio: Juliancito is a queer, trans, Jewish, Boricua creating an intentional and inclusive space on Twitch. He primarily plays indie games, sim/farming games, and crafting/survival games. He has a dog named Izzy and a cat named Pikachu.

jsonStreamers.name: SickEmErik
jsonStreamers.bio: Erik is a queer streamer based in Hawaii that spreads positivity by uplifting others. Erik fosters a space that encourages others to succeed and feel validated. Erik hopes to be a role model to encourage younger gaymers to be their authentic selves.

jsonStreamers.name: spacevalkyries
jsonStreamers.bio: Val or spacevalkyries (she/they) is a queer biracial variety streamer with ADHD, social anxiety, and chronic pain/fatigue. They’re also a sci-fi/fantasy writer! You can find her on Twitter @spacevalkyries.

jsonStreamers.name: miabyte
jsonStreamers.bio: Mia is a Twitch Ambassador, trans woman, variety streamer, and Vtuber. They're of course an LGBTQIA+ advocate, and the Live Content Producer for Gayming Magazine, where she manages and hosts a range of shows on their Twitch channel.

jsonStreamers.name: queerapollo
jsonStreamers.bio: Queerapollo is a queer AAPI variety streamer that enjoys comfort and chaos. He plays Dead by Daylight, Final Fantasy, several MMOs, and loves anime! He's an actor/director and enjoys puns and dad jokes!

jsonStreamers.name: itsleidylei
jsonStreamers.pronouns: She/They in drag, He/They out of drag
jsonStreamers.bio:
Leidy Lei is a drag queen who loves all things horror, and she's a proud member of Team Stream Queens!

She's worked all over Aotearoa (New Zealand) as an actor and as a drag artist.

She also placed as second runner up on TVNZ's House of Drag!

jsonStreamers.name: Dubu
jsonStreamers.bio: Dubu is a chill variety streamer from Australia. They're Asexual, Aromantic and Agender and love playing story rich, LGBTQIA+ and MMO games.

jsonStreamers.name: chasestorm52
jsonStreamers.bio: My name is Chase. I'm a Trans/Non-binary, Asexual, Polyamorous and Disabled streamer. Aside from games I also create art, watch horror films and practice witchcraft.

jsonStreamers.name: rat_emoji
jsonStreamers.bio: Rat is a queer, non-binary streaming from Down Under. They stream a variety of content, with a focus on horror and survival games. Rat is also the co-founder of Aussie Pride, Australia's only LGBTQIA+ stream team with over 80 creators.

jsonStreamers.name: Appleadayxo
jsonStreamers.bio: The silly, funny gorgeous Drag Queen Content Creator of Twitch! Apple Aday marries her love of campy drag into everything she does. Catch her gaming, doing mukbangs, and performing on twitch!

jsonStreamers.name: HaiBobby
jsonStreamers.bio: Bobby is a latine queer streamer who champions for diversity & inclusion in their content & spaces. As the Founder of Team Overture, Bobby seeks & creates opportunities for their community to participate in, that supports marginalized communities.

jsonStreamers.name: Polople
jsonStreamers.bio: Polople is a 24 year old queer content creator from South Australia. They play and stream a range of games, but mainly focusing on RPG/Story Driven titles.

jsonStreamers.name: cptn_sumi
jsonStreamers.bio: My name is Sumi (she/her), I'm a 30-something bubbly, Bisexual from Germany. I like playing games and watching movies as well as creating contents of all kinds. I can swear like a sailor! AHOI!

jsonStreamers.name: Pinot_No1r
jsonStreamers.bio: I am a queer variety and Teamfight Tactics (TFT) streamer. I am very community based and focus on making my stream fun while also touching on serious topics. Weekly I do a talk show called Teamfight Chatics where I interview a guest while playing TFT

jsonStreamers.name: itsTealyxo
jsonStreamers.pronouns: He out of drag She in drag but any are fine.
jsonStreamers.bio: itsTealyxo is your Favourite Aussie Bimbo! Playing DBD and Fortnite with a variety of other games on Twitch. Buckle your seat belts for a journey of chaotic gameplay with dumb luck esports moments, stunning looks and lip sync performances!

jsonStreamers.name: KiyoshiYoRHa
jsonStreamers.bio: I am a drag puzzle streamer. I'm a logical gamer so I really enjoy solving puzzles and other games even if they're not considered puzzles! I really enjoy impactful video game music as well!

jsonStreamers.name: Siforias_
jsonStreamers.bio: My name is Siforias. I'm a gay latino variety twitch streamer, game developer, and freelance writer. I love working in the video game industry whether its playing, making, or sharing with people all the adventures!

jsonStreamers.name: AbbersM2
jsonStreamers.bio: Hi! I'm Abi. I am a fat/pansexual/genderfluid/neurodivergent variety streamer who uses she/they pronouns. I usually play games with no camera, but also play music, make art, and do cosplay sometimes. On Sundays, we go down Wikipedia rabbit holes.

jsonStreamers.name: PlayItJason
jsonStreamers.bio: Hi, I'm Jason! I'm a variety streamer, musician, and team lead for Team Overture. I live in the beautiful state Maine with my husband and two adorable dogs, Henry and Oliver.

jsonStreamers.name: JirPlays
jsonStreamers.bio: You know that crazy aunt, well thats me. Except... I don't drink, I go by they/them, am Gay and happily married.

jsonStreamers.name: TheKikiNasty
jsonStreamers.bio: TheKikiNasty is a non-binary streamer who enjoys speedrunning, indie, and horror games! They love sharing joy and eccentricity through gaming and fitness vlogs on YouTube as well as a few monthly community streams featuring Minecraft, DBD, + more!
